name: Bernard Grasscloth Linen Swivel Armchair - Wheat
description: The Bernard—though square in frame—has sloping arms, down-filled cushions and a plump back pillow, all upholstered in a natural-colored linen that add to its inviting appearance. The grasscloth-style linen has a more textural finish than our other linens for an organic appearance. Its seat features eight-way hand-tied springs for flexibility and comfort, and though it appears to be fixed in cover and structure, it actually benefits from a slipcover which can be removed for ease of washing and a swiveling base, allowing the user to turn 360 degrees.
